table.title: PCIe Gen4 Device Down Clock Topology Notes

entry.p: Differential SRC Clocks supporting PCIe Gen4 devices require 0.76 mm (30 mils) isolation to adjacent high speed IOs. Isolation to other Differential Clocks, USB2 and low-speed IOs can be maintained at 0.5 mm (20 mils).

[1] For signal sections routed as microstrip on surface layer, a GND ring/ shield is advised to be added (follow standard GND ring/ shield guidelines for XTAL) with sufficient GND stitching vias for the length of the microstrip trace.
[2] GND ring/ shield stitching vias should be placed at regular intervals of 4 - 12 mm.
[3] It is advised to route in inner layer as stripline/ dual stripline routing. Limit microstrip routing and follow above shielding guidelines.
